definition: Leon Davidovich Trotsky (1879-1940), early Bolshevik leader, exiled by Stalin in 1929 and murdered in 1940
prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
to trust/to entrust/to be entrusted with/to act as trustee
used in transliteration
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
Caltrop or puncture vine (Tribulus terrestris)/to thatch (a roof)
base/foundation/basic/radical (chemistry)/(slang) gay

sentences.english: Trotsky's thought in literature and art was very rich.
sentences.chinese: 托洛茨基的文艺思想很丰富。

sentences.english: Showing off his heroism with neither war nor reconciliation.
sentences.chinese: 托洛茨基到远东，不战不和逞英雄。

sentences.english: A internationalism was a fundamental canon of trotskyism.
sentences.chinese: 国际主义是托洛茨基主义的基本原则。
